20101220190657.000|20101220190658.000|CC1|TERRORISM OFFICIALS ARE ALWAYS  
20101220190658.000|20101220190659.000|CC1|CONCERNED BECAUSE PEOPLE GATHER 
20101220190659.000|20101220190702.000|CC1|IN MAJOR GROUPS FOR CHRISTMAS

20101220190709.000|20101220190710.000|CC1|THOSE ARE EVENTS THAT GREATLY   
20101220190710.000|20101220190711.000|CC1|INCREASE THE CONCERNS OF

20101220190713.000|20101220190716.000|CC1|MOVE NOW TO TRY TO PREEMPT THAT.
20101220190716.000|20101220190718.000|CC1|>> MICHAEL SHEEHAN WITH THE     
20101220190718.000|20101220190724.000|CC1|LATEST ON THIS DEVELOPING NEWS. 
20101220190724.000|20101220190727.000|CC1|>> IN A MATTER OF MINUTES WE    
20101220190727.000|20101220190728.000|CC1|WERE SLOPPING AROUND IN WATER.  
20101220190728.000|20101220190732.000|CC1|>> DAYS OF RECORD BREAKING
